page.description: Switch controls are ideal for toggling between two states, such as 'Yes' or 'No, in which repeated entry into a field might become onerous.

section.description: For a walkthrough of the Switch control see [this video]. Alpha Anywhere also allows you to define both two state switch controls as well as multi-state control. However, this is done in the Form View Builder. See ["Building a Multi-State Switch Control"] and ["Building a Two-State Switch Control"] for more detail.
